          <title>
            <string language="en">Kinetic model of matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinetisches Modell des Stoffes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle cinétique de matière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelo cinético da matéria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello cinetico della materia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κινητικό μοντέλο του θέματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo cinético de la materia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This figure shows the molecules on a lump of lead and what happens to these molecules when hit by a hammer.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attractive forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic model</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strong bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weak bond</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Moleküle auf einem 
Klumpen der Leitung und was diesen Molekülen geschieht, wenn es durch
einen Hammer geschlagen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette figure montre les molécules sur un morceau 
de fil de sortie et ce qui arrive à ces molécules une fois frappé 
par un marteau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta figura mostra as moléculas em uma 
protuberância da ligação e o que acontece a estas moléculas quando
batido por um martelo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa figura mostra le molecole su un grumo di 
cavo e che cosa accade a queste molecole una volta colpito da un 
martello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο αριθμός εμφανίζει τα μόρια σε ένα κομμάτι 
του μολύβδου και τι συμβαίνει σε αυτά τα μόρια όταν χτυπιούνται 
από ένα σφυρί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta figura muestra las moléculas en un terrón 
del terminal de componente y qué sucede a estas moléculas cuando es 
golpeada por un martillo.</string>
          </description>
